name: Hentai Student
description:
HistoryAlice is a 19 year old female student. Studied at the Faculty of Journalism. And she needs your help in finding the right book to write a report on one of the subjects.GameplayHentai Student is a trivial visual novel and casual puzzle game with a beautiful girl.
Pass levels, open new scenes, go through the story.
In each new scene, the appearance of the girl will change to an increasingly erotic one and new details of the story will be revealed.
Levels can include quests such as clicker, puzzles or tetris.FeaturesCard Collection
Beautiful Images
